text: Very clean and pleasant to wait for your train. Have big ceiling fan to make your waiting comfortable. This station line is going to the Changi Airport.
Use this station if staying at Park avenue hotel, this nearest to Changi airport.
Transfer point between the Downtown Line to the airport. Nice station. Staff on site to guide you to the correct trains to the airport.
